casebody.data:
No. 11-6801. Charles Mason, Petitioner v. Salvador A. Godinez, Director, Illinois Department of Corrections, et al. 565 U.S. 1068, 132 S. Ct. 781,

181 L. Ed. 2d 500,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 8628, November 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appellate Court of Illinois, Fourth District, denied.

Same case below, 405 Ill. App. 3d 1218, 375 Ill. Dec. 707, 997 N.E.2d 1018.
